title: Nicole Is Poling on the Inside Now!
description:
No sleep till Brooklyn! This week we discuss Sasheer’s new Tesla adventures and literal window shopping, Nicole’s vegan corn dogs and too-big bagel, their ideas for inventions, the newest season of Rock the Block, and what even is glass? Also Tiffany Brooks - please reach out! Nicole wants you to do her friend’s house! Then they answer listener questions about what to do when your friend doesn’t like seeing your boyfriend shirtless, and how to manage the haters.

 

Email or call Nicole & Sasheer with your friendship questions at:

nicoleandsasheer@gmail.com

424-645-7003
author: fanmail+bestfriends@earwolf.com (Earwolf)
